coreAttributes.name: Meat and Marrow
coreAttributes.description: A package of 'Meat and Marrow', which consists of a slab of some sort of raw meat, wrapped in grease-proof paper and tied up with brown string.

effectTooltipLines.line: If muscles are less than [style.colourMuscleThree('muscular')], increases muscles by 1

coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot stronger...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 5)] #IF(npc.getMuscleValue()<60) [#npc.incrementMuscle(1)] #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the package's brown string, and after peeling back the grease-proof paper, [npc.verb(bring)] the now-exposed slab of Meat and Marrow up to [npc.her] mouth. A rich, bloody smell rises to fill [npc.her] nostrils, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(find)] [npc.herself] drooling at the thought of eating the raw meat. Without further thought, [npc.she] greedily [npc.verb(devour)] the dripping flesh, licking [npc.her] fingers clean after rapidly finishing [npc.her] impromptu meal.
